Name: Please, Don’t Touch Anything
About the game: Please, Don’t Touch Anything is a cryptic, brain-racking button-pushing simulation. Covering for a colleague who is taking a bathroom break, you find yourself in front of a mysterious panel which only component is a red button. And since you’ve clearly been instructed not to touch anything, the only thing you want to do now is push that damn button. Push it and expect to be held liable for any unintended aftermath. And there will be many. FEATURES 25 devious enigmas Singular pixel art Atmospheric chiptune soundtrack Steam Cards Achievements
